results.text: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
results.reason: Encourages reliance on prayer and trust in God to overcome anxiety.
results.reflection: Instead of worrying, bring your concerns to God in prayer.

results.text: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
results.reason: Emphasizes the care and concern God has for His people, inviting them to release their anxieties to Him.
results.reflection: God's care for us is a reason to trust Him with our worries.

results.text: Therefore do not be anxious about tomorrow, for tomorrow will be anxious for itself. Sufficient for the day is its own trouble.
results.reason: Reminds us to focus on the present and trust God for each day's needs.
results.reflection: Worrying about the future robs us of the joy of today.

results.text: When anxiety was great within me, your consolation brought me joy.
results.reason: Acknowledges that God's comfort and presence can bring joy in the midst of anxiety.
results.reflection: Finding joy in God's presence can calm our anxious hearts.

results.text: Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God; I will strengthen you, I will help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: Assures believers of God's presence, strength, and help in times of fear and anxiety.
results.reflection: God's promises of strength and support can replace our fears with faith.
